item.title: Data structures in Go: Linked lists
item.description: Data structures and algorithms are the bread and butter of computer science. Although sometimes they appear scary to people, most of them have a simple explanation. Also, when explained well with a problem algorithms can be interesting and fun to learn and apply. Image taken from Undraw. This post is aimed at people that are not comfortable with linked lists, or folks that want to see and learn how to build one with Golang.
